name: Tasytt Inc.
description: Provider of a Slackbot platform created for team collaboration and on boarding. The company's platform provides a web virtual assistant to help teams collaborate and make faster decisions, enabling them to be informed of team members and save time and effort in decision making.
one_liner: Provider of a Slackbot platform created for team collaboration and on boarding. The company's platform provides a web virtual assistant to help teams collaborate and make faster decisions, enabling them to be informed of team members and save time and effort in decision making.
